title: Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site: Where To Eat
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Where To Eat              Where To Eat      There are four accessible picnic tables on the south side of the property. Cushinberry Park, a city park, is located to the east of the visitor parking lot.  The park has charcoal grills, picnic tables, and playground equipment. Local restaurant information can be found on the Visit Topeka Inc. website.  Click here for their website.
